mapper.select: SELECT LINEITEM.ORDERID, LINEITEM.LINENUM AS lineNumber, LINEITEM.ITEMID, LINEITEM.QUANTITY, LINEITEM.UNITPRICE FROM LINEITEM WHERE LINEITEM.ORDERID = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LINEITEM (ORDERID, LINENUM, ITEMID, QUANTITY, UNITPRICE) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{lineNumber}, #{itemId}, #{quantity}, #{unitPrice})
